snippet: A bipartisan Senate bill that would increase penalties for perpetrators and support for victims of human trafficking met potentially fatal resistance Wednesday over an anti-abortion provision.
lead_paragraph: A bipartisan Senate bill that would increase penalties for perpetrators and support for victims of human trafficking met potentially fatal resistance Wednesday over an anti-abortion provision.

headline.main: Anti-Abortion Provision May Stop Human Trafficking Bill in Senate
headline.print_headline: Anti-Abortion Provision May Stop Human Trafficking Bill In Senate
